name: Bank crash
description:
What can be more interesting than to rob a bank? This game is full of daring robberies, pursuits and fun! Unreally beautiful landscapes, massive explosions and mysterious planets - all of these is waiting for you in Bank Crash!

In game you will find:
- great amount of different levels
- unique cars
- quick and annoying police
- and a helicopter (because there is no cool story without it)
